doc.summary: Sets the noise range used for this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/sandbox/generator/BiomeLayer">BiomeLayer</ref> to the full noise range.

doc.summary: Sets the noise range used for this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/sandbox/generator/BiomeLayer">BiomeLayer</ref> to be automatically computed to cover the minimum  noise range that includes all contained biomes.

doc.summary: Gets this layer a zero density everywhere.
doc.text: Gets this layer a zero density everywhere. Useful for the base layer of a dimension that others can  then generate on top of.

doc.summary: Adds a <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/biome/Biome">Biome</ref> to this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/sandbox/generator/BiomeLayer">BiomeLayer</ref> and returns a builder for this biomes climate settings.

doc.text: Adds a <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/biome/Biome">Biome</ref> to this <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/sandbox/generator/BiomeLayer">BiomeLayer</ref> and returns a builder for this biomes climate settings.

Builds the BiomeLayer.
This method returns an intrusive holder that must be properly added the registry. RegistryProviderBase does this automatically if the result is stored in a public, non-static field inside the provider.
